- pathway: $i$
    - weight: $w_i$, where $\sum_i w_i = 1$
    - exclusivity:  $x_i$
- configuration: $j$
    - number of mutated sites: $s_{j,i}$; $s_j = \sum_i s_{j,i}$; $s_i = \sum_j s_{j,i}$
    - number of non-first mutations: $a_{j,i} = \max(0, s_{j,i} - 1)$
    - multinomial coefficient: $M_j = \frac {s_j!} {\prod_i s_{j,i}!}$
    - unnormalized probability of the configuration:
      $p_j = M_j \prod_i w_i^{s_{j,i}} x_i^{a_{j,i}}$
    - normalized probability of the configuration:
      $P_j = \frac {p_j} {D_{s_j}}$
    - denominator to normalize probability:
      $D_s = \sum_j^{s = s_j} p_j$.

<div>$$\begin{split}
\log \left(\prod _j ^\mathrm{samples} P_j \right)
  &= \sum_j ^\mathrm{samples} \log \frac {p_j} {D_{s_j}} \\
  &= \sum_j \log \left(M_j \prod_i w_i^{s_{j,i}} x_i^{a_{j,i}} \right)
   - \sum_j \log D_{s_j} \\
  &= \sum_j \left(\log M_j + \sum_i s_{j,i} \log w_i + \sum_i a_{j,i} \log x_i \right)
   - \sum_j \log D_{s_j} \\
  &= \sum_j \log M_j
   + \sum_i s_i \log w_i
   + \sum_i a_i \log x_i
   - \sum_s \left(N_s \log D_s \right) \\
\end{split}$$</div>
